name: IBM Multicloud Manager Klusterlet on IBM Cloud Private With OpenShift
description: This terraform template imports an existing IBM Cloud Private cluster on OpenShift to a IBM Multicloud Manager Controller (Hub Cluster).

metadata.longDescription: This terraform template imports an existing IBM Cloud Private cluster on OpenShift to a IBM Multicloud Manager Controller (Hub Cluster).

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
2. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
